member.name: T:Duality.Graphics.Animation
member.summary: Represents an animated texture.
member.remarks: Currently, this class assumes that each frame of animation is as wide as each animation is tall. The number of frames in the animation are inferred from this.

member.name: P:Duality.Graphics.Animation.Texture
member.summary: All frames in the animation arranged horizontally.

member.name: P:Duality.Graphics.Animation.FrameTime
member.summary: Duration of time to show each frame.

member.name: P:Duality.Graphics.Animation.IsLooping
member.summary: When the end of the animation is reached, should it continue playing from the beginning?

member.name: P:Duality.Graphics.Animation.FrameCount
member.summary: Gets the number of frames in the animation.

member.name: P:Duality.Graphics.Animation.FrameWidth
member.summary: Gets the width of a frame in the animation.

member.summary: Gets the height of a frame in the animation.

member.summary: Constructs a new animation.

member.summary: Controls playback of an Animation.

member.summary: Gets the animation which is currently playing.

member.summary: Gets the index of the current frame in the animation.

member.summary: The amount of time in seconds that the current frame has been shown for.

member.summary: Gets a texture origin at the bottom center of each frame.
